amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement an Executive Order concerning agency rulemaking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to implement Executive Order 13422.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Miller (NC).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
